name: Psychopath Basement
description:
/!\ Made for Ludum Dare 47:  Stuck in a loop

Hey everybody! Hope you had a great time during this weekend of the jam :)

Your mission, if you accept it, is to escape a basement of a psychopath that wants to cook you.

You have three people to save and you can either save one, or two, or go crazy and save all three of them! Yay!

The loop theme in the game is that each time you select a character, a timer will reset and his movement will be recorded. So when you will change to another character, the movement you did with the previous one will be replaying.
It's you who needs to coordinate your actions in order to escape.
It's not going to be easy... but we believe in you! :)

For more comfort, play the webGL version on chrome or edge, but if you use firefox or want to apprecaite the game, download it! :)

controls:
- movement: WASD
- Action: E
- Throw: Q for cursor and left-click to throw
